item.title: By: thezonie
item.dc:creator: thezonie
item.description:
After my wife introduced me to Farkel I simply got addicted to it.
So much so that I wrote my own version for the Apple iPhone and iPod Touch.
http://ifarkle.com/
If you ever stop by and give it a try, any feedback would be greatly appreciated. :)
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:

http://ifarkle.com/

item.title: By: nertzfan
item.dc:creator: nertzfan
item.description: Hi, I found your blog post through a search for "Nertz". It is cool to see others that know about the game. I hope you don't mind but I wanted to let you know about playnertz.com, the site for the National Nertz Association. There is a bunch of interesting Nertz information there and you can also find out how to play Nertz online there. I hope you will check it out. Feel free to join and also let your friends and family know. Thanks again
item.content:encoded: Hi, I found your blog post through a search for “Nertz”. It is cool to see others that know about the game. I hope you don’t mind but I wanted to let you know about playnertz.com, the site for the National Nertz Association. There is a bunch of interesting Nertz information there and you can also find out how to play Nertz online there. I hope you will check it out. Feel free to join and also let your friends and family know. Thanks again
